Name: CCCP CALLS!
About the game: COMRADES ! Let's get into the protection of our motherland and make three in a row! CCCP CALLS! is classic communist match 3 game with beautiful anime girl! Help Natasha to liberate motherland and defeat the Enemy!! Light casual gameplay in the best traditions of the genre on the map of Europe. It's easy to learn, and hard to 3 stars! Explore casual match3 in company with cute anime girls! Game features FOR MOTHER RUSSIA! You can protect your homeland! Casual match3 gameplay Simple and fun! Tovarisch! Achievements! 3 stars difficulty level VODKA!
